links.*: A Description of the Island of Númenor

wikitext.*:
[[File:Matěj Čadil - Noirinan.jpg|thumb|[[Matěj Čadil]] - ''Noirinan'']]
'''Noirinan''', or the '''Valley of the Tombs''', was located between the southwest and southeast ridges of the Mountain [[Meneltarma]] on the island of [[Númenor]].<ref>{{UT|NMap}}</ref>  The shallow valley held the tombs of the [[Kings of Númenor]], cut into the rock of the mountain. In Noirinan was also the spring of the river [[Siril]], the main course of water which flowed across the island of Númenor.<ref>{{UT|Numenor}}</ref>
